#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define MAX 1000009
#define ll long long
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define ull unsigned long long
#define f(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define min3(a,b,c) ((a>b?b:a)>c?c:(a>b?a:b))
#define max3(a,b,c) ((a>b?a:b)>c?(a>b?a:b):c)
#define caloc(i,a) (i *)calloc(a,sizeof(i))
inline int gcd(int a,int b){if(b==0)return a;else return gcd(b,a%b);}
inline int lcm(int a,int b){return (a*b)/gcd(a,b);}
void getInt(int &n){n=0;int ch=gc();while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')ch=gc();while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9')n=(n<<3)+(n<<1)+ch-'0',ch=gc();}
void putInt(int n){int i=0;char ch[20];if(n==0)pc('0');while(n>0)ch[i]=(n%10)+'0',n=n/10,i++;while(i>0)pc(ch[i-1]),i--;pc('\n');}


int main(){
    int t,n;
    getInt(t);
    while(t--){
        getInt(n);
        if(n%3==0||n%2==0){
            pc('Y');pc('E');pc('S');pc('\n');
        }
        else{
            pc('N');pc('O');pc('\n');}
        
    }
    
   return 0;
}
